transcript: what is happening in Palestine our brothers and sisters are being killed being slaughtered and what what should we do the only thing we can do is make Dua number one every night you have to pray night prayer and no one can save them except Allah no Arabs no Muslims no United Nations except Allah no said in the [Music] Quran I am oppressed so avenge me oh Allah number two financial aids if you know any trusted organization that would take aids to them number three make their plight alive in social media wherever you can post videos share with people interviews this is inhumane what's happening and the problem is acknowledge who's supporting Israel who's supporting Israel you [Music] know
